column5: Anyone know where I can fish from shore in the North Bay area?
The main waterfront in North Bay is decent. PM sent.
There is a huge pier downtown near the Marina many people fish off there.Where the Chief Commanda is docked.
Thank you folks, I'll give the pier a shot(or a line I should say)
Sunset point off Lakeshore dr. is another spot worth trying as well. I can give you directions if you need them.
Would much appreciate it. Thanks Neil

Sunset Point is just off of Lakeshore Dr behind Churchills restaurant and the White Owl Bistro. There is alot of parking and easy access toi fish of of the rocks behind the trees. Decent boat launch too.
haha, I pm'd him this morning.
or you can drive an extra 20 minutes West to Sturgeon Falls and do good from shore on the Sturgeon River ... expect a mixed bag o'fish.  Randy
